1.content:
When the small, alien spaceship come speeding through the outer atmosphere towards earth, it takes on the shape of a small meteor. It speeds towards the North American continent as it rapidly approaches the surface.

Luckily, Patrick and Karen have no idea what is going on, since they're in suspended animation, so they notice nothing of the bumpy ride to the planet's surface.

Finally, the spacecraft crashes in a small lake with a mighty plunge before it glides across the water at high speed. After a few seconds, it slides over the water and stops on the shore of the lake, due to the force of the impact, where it remains.

The internal computer system on board had detected that the environment was safe and that the ship has come to a rest. The passengers could now be taken out of their state of suspended animation. As soon as this happens, Patrick and Karen open their eyes and wake up.

"Where are we?" Patrick asks the ship's computer. It replies that they have landed somewhere in North America. Then the computer shows them a list of words in English, French and Spanish. Since these kids are super intelligent, they pick up on these words right away and they learn how to speak these languages fluently in just a matter of hours before they can leave the ship.

Finally, the door to the space craft opens for the first time, letting the fresh air in.

The two children are dressed in red and blue jumpsuits and black boots when they walk out and down the ramp of the ship for the first time, not knowing where they are...
1.title: Arrival

choices: A couple adopts Karen and Patrick
11.content:
“Ooh this place looks so lovely…” Karen smiled, as she walked over to a small bush where she spotted some flowers.

“Be careful, Karen!” Patrick warned her. “There may be some wild animals around here!”

Patrick wandered around the trees, looking for any other signs of life.

“So, what do we do, now?” Karen asked, as she picked a flower from the flower bed.

“Well, we need to find out where the people are. We need to get some food and something to drink, and a place to stay would be nice.”

Patrick then saw a tree with some thick branches. He wondered if he could jump high enough, so he could grab hold of the branch. Maybe he could get a better view from standing on the branch. He leaped in the air, and he suddenly started flying!

“Whaaaa! Karen! KAREN!” he shouted, as he soared across the sky. “I’m flying!”

“Patrick! Whoa! I wonder if I can do that, too!” Karen wondered out loud. “It looks like fun!”

Then Karen jumped up with her arms extended and started flying through the air as well! It took her a few moments to control her direction, but she got the hang of it, just like her brother did.

“WHOOHOOO!” Patrick cheered, as he soared over the trees. “Follow me, sis!”

The two flying kids then ascended over the forest until they suddenly saw the highway, which ran nearby. There were many cars and truck riding on it, at high speed.

“Look at that street! Maybe we can ask someone on that busy street to give us directions!” Karen suggested, as she flew next to her brother.

“Yeah… I hope so…” he said.

The two kids continued to fly over the highway until they spotted a car, which was parked along the side of the road, on the curb. A lady had just gotten out, and she was examining her front tire, which had a flat.

“Look! Look at that lady over there! Maybe she can help us!” Karen pointed out.

Karen and Patrick landed behind the car so that the lady didn’t see the kids fly and land, since she was bent down and trying to unscrew the nuts from the screws, which held the tire in place.

“Excuse me, ma’am, would you like some help?” Patrick said to the lady.

The lady was middle aged, tall and skinny. She had long, brown hair and she was obviously very frustrated at the fact that she got a flat on the highway.

“Hi… Oh, yes, I could use a hand…” she replied. “But, where did you two kids come from?” she wondered.

“Oh, we just got here. We flew…” Karen smiled.

“You flew? In an airplane?” the lady asked.

“No! We came in our spaceship!” Patrick replied. “How can we help you?”

“Space ship? Oh my!” the lady said. “Well, umm… I need a jack… I have no way to lift the front of my car so I can get the tire off…”

“Let me try!” Patrick said, as he walked over to the front and placed his hand under her front bumper. Then he gently lifted up and raised the entire front of the car about two feet off the ground, like the vehicle was as light as a feather!

“Oh my God…” the woman gasped, when she noted Patrick’s incredible feat of strength. “How did you do that?”

“I can get your tire off, ma’am!” Karen said, as she walked over and quickly unscrewed all the bolts from the screws. Then she pulled the tire off, like it was a toy. “Here, give me your spare!”

“My spare is in my trunk…” the lady said. She could almost not believe her eyes. Where did these super kids come from? How did they get so strong?

Karen opened her trunk and pulled the spare out, carrying it with one hand. Then she placed the spare on the screws and tightened the bolts over the screws, holding it in place. Finally, she put the hubcap back on. Patrick gently set the car back on the ground again.

“There you go, ma’am!” Patrick cheered. “All done!” he said, as he put the old tire in her trunk.

“Well, I’m very impressed with you two kids! You did that like it was so easy for you! You two are so strong! How did you do that?” the lady wondered.

“We just came from Xavalia. Ever since we arrived here, we realized that we could fly and now we saw that we’re really strong, too. I guess we have super powers on earth!” Patrick explained.

“Where’s Xavalia?” the lady asked.

“It’s a planet, very far away…”

“Oh my goodness…”

“Ma’am…” Karen asked. “We’re kinda lost. Can you take us somewhere where we can eat and drink and find a place to stay?”

“Sure! My name is Julie, by the way! I’m going to my church service. What are your names?”

“I’m Patrick!” the boy replied.

“I’m Karen!” Karen cheered, as she rubbed her hands on her blue suit.

“Well, hop in; I’ll get you something to eat!” Julie said. “By the way, we’re close to the beach! Welcome to California! Maybe we can go swimming later! I can hook you up with some of the other couples in my church…”

The kids got in her car and they drove off, leaving the space ship behind in the woods.
11.title: They're in California

choices: They meet other kids from Julie's church
Patrick and Karen move in with Julie
Julie takes the super kids to the beach
111.content:
Julie drove the kids to a fast-food restaurant which was near the coast. As they were driving, Karen and Patrick remarked how beautiful the area seemed to them, and how eager they were to go to the beach sometime in the near future.

“Ooh look at that building!” Karen pointed out; as they drove by a large warehouse. “It is stocked with lots of toys!”

“Toys?” Julie asked. “How do you know? We can only see the walls from the outside!”

“Well, if I concentrate hard enough, I see through them and then I see all the stuff inside of the building!” Karen blurted out.

“Yeah, I see it too!” Patrick remarked, as he peered out the window from the front seat of the car.

“That’s amazing…” Julie said. “You kids are amazing…”

“It’s called x-ray vision. We both have it. Don’t all other people have it, too?” Patrick asked Julie.

“No, Patrick. Most people on earth don’t have x-ray vision…”

“But they can fly, right?” Karen wondered out loud.

“No…” Julie smiled. “Earthlings can’t fly, either. Only you two can do that!”

“Oh wow… We had better be careful, Karen!” Patrick warned his sister. “People will know we’re different!”

“Yes… No earthling is strong enough to lift a car, either…” Julie added.

“But, your car wasn’t heavy! It was as light as a feather!” Patrick protested.

“Patrick…” Julie laughed. “Cars are very heavy! You have super strength! Oh! Here the place!”

Julie pulled into the parking lot of a MacDonald’s and parked the car in a spot near the entrance. She turned off the engine and then opened the door. The two kids followed suit and jumped out, closing the doors behind them.

The threesome stood in line and ordered their food before they took their seats at one of the tables near the back of the restaurant.

Patrick started eating his hamburger before he ate his fries, but Karen first ate her fries. When she finally got to her hamburger, it had gotten cold. She removed the bun and took the lettuce and the tomato off, exposing the beef patty.

“My burger is cold! I wish I could warm it up again…” she said, as she stared at it intently.

Suddenly, two red beams of light shot from her eyes, striking the beef patty, heating it up instantly!

“Oh my goodness!” Julie gasped.

“Oh cool!” Patrick cheered. “You figured out how to use your heat vision! I need to test mine out as well!”

Patrick them grabbed one of his French fries and held it before him, setting it on fire with his own heat vision, before putting the burning fry in his mouth.

“Yumm! Nice and crispy!” he grinned, as he ate the burning fry while the flame was still burning!

“That… That was amazing!” Julie said, with her jaw open wide. “You two can start fires with your eyes!”

“Thanks for lunch, Miss Julie!” Patrick said politely. “It was delicious!”

As the three walked out the door, Karen turned around and hugger Julie.

“I really like you, Miss Julie!” she said. “Please let us stay with you!”

“Well, let me take you to church and we’ll take it from there, alright? I live with my son, and maybe you can live with me for awhile…”

The kids got in her car and Julie started the engine before she pulled out of the parking lot and headed to the church where she had a meeting to attend.
111.title: They go to a restaurant

choices: Patrick and Karen meet Julie’s son
Patrick and Karen participate during church
1111.content:
Julie bought Patrick and Karen new close before they made their way to church. Patrick wore a black suit and Tie, and Karen wore a pure white dress that came down to her knees, both their shoes where black. Julie would never admit it but all of this was costing her a pretty penny. Julie parked right outside the church, she didn’t get out of the car. What was she going to do? What was she going to say to everyone including her son and husband? All she could do was wing it.

“Ok guys, we’re here.” Julie said turning around and looking at Patrick and Karen.

“So Listen I need you two to do me a huge favor.” Julie said with a small smile.

“What do you need miss Julie?” Patrick asked

“I need you both to not use your powers out in public.”

Julie did not know how the kids would react but she need to get them to understand that being different is not always easy. The last thing she wanted was for everyone to be running out of a burning church.

“Don’t worry Julie we have already decided to not use our power, in front of other people.” Patrick said

“Oh.” Julie said with a little surprise in her voice

Julie did not know this but Xavalians were able to do complex thinking at great speeds, this was further amplified with Patrick and Karen being empowered by earths yellow sun. Both Patrick and Karen already thought about what would happen if they exposed themselves, and lets just say 95 out of 100% it would probably end badly, and worse they feared that Julia would be in danger. So they already decided to keep their powers a secret.

“Don’t worry miss Julie we won’t let anyone find out about our powers.” Karen said with a smile.

“Ok guys let’s go to church.”

Julie and the kids get out of the car and walk into the church. The church was called Salvation Core Church, and Julie had been going to this church ever since she was Karen’s age. Upon walking into the church Julie notices that service had already started and whispered to both Patrick and Karen to be quiet. People where sitting down in their seats listening to the pastor Doug who stood in the front preaching the good word.

“Ok guys follow me I’m taking you guys to children’s church.” Julie whispered

Patrick and Karen followed Julie throughout the church, and soon they came to a wooden door. On the door was a sign that read children’s church in colorful letters. Karen used her x-ray vision to see through the door and she saw about 25 children who where all gathered together sitting down in a circle. She was a little nerves, she proved this by hiding behind her brother. Julie saw this and smiled.

“You nerves Karen?”

“A little. These are the first kids we’ve been around, what if they don’t like me.” Karen said

“Don’t worry they will love you, and my kids in their as well so he’ll look after you.” Julie said patting Karen’s head.

“I’m going to be with you as well.” Patrick said grabbing her hand.

Julie opens the door and all three walk into the room filled with children.

“Julie its good to see you.”

A women with short blond hair and a black dress walks towards Julie and gives her a hug.

“It’s good to see you as well Lana, I’m just dropping off my kids.”

Julie puts both her hands on both Patrick’s and Julie’s back pushing them both forward.

Lana looked confuse, did she just say kids. Lana had known Julie for a long time, she had never seen these kids before.

Julie saw Lana’s skepticism and she was a little worried. Lana had a lot of questions but for now she had children to welcome.

“Ok Guys welcome to children’s church.”
1111.title: Julie takes the kids to church

choices: Patrick and Karen join Christopher for church
Julie leaves church with Patrick and Karen and Christopher
11111.content:
Patrick and Karen where a little shy, this was there first time being in front of so many humans. Lana had taken Julie outside the room, so Patrick and Karen where alone in the room with the children staring right at them.

“Hi.” Patrick said raising his right hand.

(Outside the room)

Julie knew that she was in trouble, when Lana had taken her out of the room. She knew that she was in even more trouble when Lana said nothing, Lana just stood still looking at her.

“So do you want to explain, or just look at me funny.” Lana said putting her hands on her hips

“Explain?” Julie asked confused

“Yes explain, who are those children because they sure as hell are not yours.”

Julie didn’t know what to say, how was she going to explain? Lana was her best friend, but she couldn’t tell Lana about Patrick and Karen. She couldn’t tell Lana about how Patrick and Lana had superpowers, and how they are aliens from another planet. She would be tossed into the looney-bin for even talking about things less ridiculous. No she had to come up with a story.

“I, I, those kids.....”

Julie was stumbling over her words, and Lana was giving her that look, the look that told Julie that Lana knew that she was hiding something, which Julie was hiding something. Then Julie remembered something that her farther had once told her. “Sometimes telling the truth is the right way to go, some of the truth, that is.”

“I found them on the way to church, just walking down the road, and with no one in site I decided to bring them to church.”

Julie explained the best that she could, without giving away Patrick and Karen’s true origins. Lana listened to Julie’s story with great interest, Lana knew that Julie was still hiding a few things, but decided to let it go, seeing as how she still had a class to teach.

“Ok, ok I get it, thank god you came by when you did.” Lana said with a little smile.

(Back in the classroom)

Patrick and Karen where still standing in front of all the children, who looked at them with great suspicion. Julie and Lana where like celebrities to the children, and both of the people they regarded with respect and cherished had left the room right after Patrick and Karen had appeared.

“Hey”

A boy walks over to Patrick and Karen with a hard-nosed look. The boy had short brown hair, and small freckles that kind of reminded Patrick and Karen of Julie. The boy had light blue eyes, that seemed to shine like diamonds when the suns rays bounced off of them, which reminded Karen and Patrick of the Vrakros mountains that rested on their home-world of Xavalia, which were made of Diamonds and other rare shining minerals. The boy also looked to be a little older than Patrick and Karen

“Hello my names Patrick and this is Karen.” Patrick said with a. Smile

“Well Patrick and Karen, what were you doing with my mom.” The boy said with a little bit of irritation in his voice.

Patrick and Karen stared at the boy nonchalantly, they weren’t surprise to find out that the boy was miss Julie’s son, he looked exactly like her in more ways than one.

“Miss Julie she has been taking care of us.” Karen said with a big smile.

“Taking care of you???!!!” The boy yelled.

“She’s my mom, you guys just stay away from my mom you hear me or I’ll beat you up.” The boy grabs Patrick’s collar and raises his fist in anger, threatening to punch Patrick in the face.

Patrick looked at the boy with surprise, but to his incredulity he did not feel afraid.

“ Christopher Meadow Carter!”

All the students turn towards the door and see Lana and Julie with there hands on their hips. The boy in particular had a worried look on his face

“Mom?” The boy says putting his fist down.

“You let Patrick down this instant.” Julie yelled walking towards the boy named Christopher , with authority.

Christopher quickly lets Patrick go.

(What happens next)
11111.title: Patrick and Karen meet Julie’s son

111111.content:
Patrick and Karen join the rest of the children for church while Julie took Christopher outside for a little talk, which she wanted to keep private, but little did she know that Patrick had super hearing and therefore heard the entire conversation. He had never heard miss Julie so mad. Patrick didn’t want Christopher to get into trouble but decided to stay out of it. Patrick looks over at his sister and sees that she is paying attention to the so called bible lesson and therefore didn’t hear miss Julie talking to Christopher. Patrick didn’t know what bible study was but it did sound entrusting.

Patrick and Karen learned many things about the earth religion called Christianity. They learned about Moses, Noah, Abraham, and even Jesus Christ which they learned was a very important figure in human history.Patrick and Karen were no stranger when it came to religion, back on their home planet Xavalia they also had religion, and even when the Xavalians made more and more scientific advancement their belief in their so called religion did not decrease. And unlike earth which had a dozen religions, the Xavalians had only one. The Xavalians had a polytheistic religion, therefore they believed in more than one god, and at the very top of this pantheon was the great god Phiysus, the god of the dawn. Patrick and Karen didn’t know what to make of this new god, but this god did seem nice and merciful.

Christopher soon comes in and joins the class. Everyone stares at him as we awkwardly walks in and sits down, far away from Patrick and Karen. Miss Julie had left to join the grown up church. Christopher would give both Patrick and Karen hateful looks that only Karen didn’t notice. Patrick really wanted to get along with Christopher, but didn’t know how to get on his good side.

As the day advanced the children including Patrick, Karen, and Christopher participate in different activities like drawing, coloring, and board games that have something to do with biblical knowledge. Patrick was about to walk over to Christopher to talk when he heard something loud, and a dozen screams that seem to emanate from the next room

“What’s wrong?” Karen asks looking at her brother

“You didn’t hear that?” Patrick asked looking at his sister a little startled.

“Hear what?”

“Karen, I have super hearing, you should have it to just Listen.” Patrick said using his X-ray vision to see through the walls.

“Ok I’ll try.”

Karen closes her eyes and begins to focus on her ears. She listened and she heard everything. Sound from everywhere started to attack her ears, and in time overwhelm her. Karen grasps her ears and bends over in pain.

Patrick realizing that his sister is in pain, grabs her shoulders.

“Karen you have to focus, block out all of thoughts sounds as focus on my voice.” Patrick whispers into Karen’s ears.

It took awhile but soon Karen could control her hearing.

“Thank you brother.” Karen said letting out a breath of relief.

“No problem Karen, can you hear that?” Patrick said returning his attention to the noise he heard a few minutes ago.

“Yes, what is that?” Karen asks using her X-ray vision along with her brother to find out where that noise came from.

(What do they see)
111111.title: Patrick and Karen join Christopher for church

choices: Patrick and Karen do not interfere
Patrick and Karen decide to interfere
1111111.content:
5 armed men had the whole church hostage, with objects that Patrick and Karen could only assume where weapons, weapons they had never seen before. Karen using her X-ray Vision see’s miss Julie, who looked terrified and had her arms around a bearded man that Karen didn’t recognize. The men had leather masks on to hide their identities but those masks did little to hide their faces from Patrick and Karen’s X-ray vision.

“Miss Julie needs help.” Karen whispers to her brother.

Patrick looks at his sister to see that she had a worried look on her face. The truth was Patrick was worried as well, whoever these men where they truly meant to cause harm, but what could he and Karen do. They couldn’t act, not without revealing who they really are, but if they don’t act miss Julie could end up dead. Patrick was a smart boy, but he was still 8 years old, he was still a child, this whole situation truly scared him. Patrick looks over at Christopher and see Christopher looking at him and Karen with a suspicious look, which left Patrick a little confuse.

“Patrick are you alright.”

Lana walks over to Patrick, putting her hand on his shoulder. Lana saw Patrick looking scared as if he had seen a ghost, this worried her.

“BANG!”

The door bursts open and two masked gentlemen walk in with guns pointed at the ready.

“If I could have everyone’s attention.” One of the men said with a polite tone that masked his true intentions.

Lana gets in front of the kids in order to protect them.

“What do you want?” Lana says with a shivering voice.

“That’s a good question miss, what I want is all of you to be quit, don’t move, and I promise no one will get hurt. The man said holding his hands up in a playful manner.

“So do me a favor miss and get down.” The man said with that same gentle voice but with a little more authority in his tone this time.

Lana bends down and gets on her knees, still staying in front of the children.

“How dare you.” Lana said with anger in her voice.

Both men look at her as if she were crazy.

“This is the house of god, how dare you come here with guns threatening peoples lives.

The two men laughed, but Patrick could sense a little bit of pain in their laughter.

“God.... yes I once believed in that name, I once believed in this religion, but let me ask you miss.”

The masked man steps closer to miss Lana, getting on his knees he points his weapon at Lana’s head, with death in his eyes.

“Where is god Hm? Where is he when people need him, people are suffering and god is no where to be found. Do you know why that is?” The man asks.

“Because their is no god.”

The masked man had hatred in his voice, and his calm demeanor became more threatening.

(Julie’s perspective)

Julie didn’t know what was going on but she was terrified. This day had gone from crazy to crazier. First she had found alien kids down the high way to church, the next she was being held hostage in a church of all places. She looked at her husband Marcus (Mark for short), and notices he was just as scared as she was. Julie couldn’t help but think of the children Christopher, Patrick, and Karen. She couldn’t help but wonder if they would see each other again. Julie has told Mark a little about both Patrick and Karen, and even though he was skeptical about adopting these kids, he was willing to give Julie a chance, but now he might never meet them. 5 masked men had barged their way into the church holding large guns, but soon two of the men went towards the direction of the children’s church.

“Oh no” Julie whispered.

“Ladies and gentlemen men, we are so sorry to just barge in like this, but we just can’t let this stand.”

One of the masked men said with joy in his voice.

“You all offer praise to a god that doesn’t care about you, you give your selfs to a god that uses you, well we say no more. To hell withreligion, to hell with anyone who worships such a god.”

The masked man shouts. Whoever this man was Julie knew that he was insane.

“Sir, please. Do not shed blood here in the house of god.” The pastor says with a worried look.

The pastor steps closer to the armed men.

“I do not know why you are doing this, but please let me help you, god will help you.”

The pastor wears a hopeful smile on his face.

“Help me, god will help me?” The man asks.

“Yes of course god helps all of his children.” The pastor said.

The pastor puts his right hand on the masked mans shoulder.

“Just put the fun down.”

The masked man starts to put his gun down, Julie along with almost everyone starts to feel hopeful, they might actually make it out of this alive.

“God will help me you say? Then let me ask you?

The man steps forward and puts his gun to the pastors face.

“Why didn’t he help my daughter.”

“BANG!”

The masked man pulls the trigger and fires the gun right into the pastors face. The pastor falls to the ground dead. The masked man turns around and looks at the crowd of scared people still sitting in their chairs, and begins to take off his mask. The man had curly light brown hair and a small beard, a large scare surrounded his left eye.

“Do you see what we are?! Do you see what your god has made us?!” The man yells towards the heavens.

“We are not his servants, we reject the light, we reject his plan. We...... we are the forsaken!
(Back with Patrick and Karen)

“Brother what are we going to do?”
1111111.title: Armed men with guns

11111112.content:
A thousand thoughts were running trough Patrick’s head. Patrick and Karen had a accelerated thought process, so they could think a million times faster than a human being. Patrick at this moment was calculating the likelihood of everyone coming out alive, and he didn’t like the results. Patrick and Karen had over heard the man, they recognized as the leader of all these masked men, in the other room say how they were the forsaken. Patrick and Karen also saw the man shoot the Pastor in the head with his weapon. Patrick seeing this covered his sisters eyes, trying to shield her from the horrific event, little did he realize she could see through his hands with her X-ray vision. Patrick knew that these masked men were out for blood, and if what the man said was true then the likelihood of everyone coming out of this alive was less than 10%. Patrick understood that the most dangerous man in the world, was a man that had nothing to lose, these men fit that description. Patrick glanced over at Christopher, and saw how he looked scared along with all the children in the room. Patrick owed miss Julie a debt, for taking care of him and his sister, and trusting them with all of her heart, Patricks father had always told him to always pay back his debts, and right now Patrick intended to.

“Ok Karen, we have to act.” Patrick said, whispering to his little sister.

“What are we going to do?” Karen asked looking at her big brother.

Patrick looked around his surroundings and saw a black ski hat on the floor. Patrick slowly grabbing the ski hat used his heat vision to carve three holes into it without anyone noticing, making it a black ski mask, that robbers wear (Patrick doesn’t know this of course).

“Ok Karen I’m going to take down the bad men using this as a disguise.” Patrick said showing Karen the ski mask he created.

“Ok what am I going to do?” Karen asked.

“You... uh... you?” Patrick was a little lost for words, in truth Patrick didn’t want Karen to do anything. This could be dangerous, and Patrick didn’t want his little sister getting hurt, but if. Karen was one thing she was stubborn, she was to much of a good person to stand around and do nothing while people were getting hurt.

“You... your job is to protect everyone from the fight, make sure no one gets hurt, or caught up in the battle, ok?” Patrick asked, looking for approval.

“Ok.” Karen says with determination.

Patrick hiding behind a few of the children puts on the ski mask, and gets ready.

“I have to move as fast as I can.” Patrick thinks, concentrating on moving fast.

Patrick staying low gets on his feet, but before he starts to move he realizes something. His surroundings, the other kids, miss Lana, Christopher, Karen, and even the armed men were all moving very slow.

“What’s happening?” Patrick asks

Patrick stand up, and realizes that his body is being attacked by a lot of force, kinetic energy.

“Time hasn’t slowed down, no I’m just moving very fast.” Patrick says, thinking his currant situation through.

“Well I did want to movie fast.” Patrick said giggling to himself.

Patrick looks at his sister and realizes that she is moving faster than everyone else, but not as fast as him. Patrick soon realized that Karen unlike everyone else was able to see him even when he was moving at such a remarkable speed, but the only problem was that Karen was still in real time. Patrick knew that Karen had the power to move at the same speeds but right now he didn’t have time to teach her.

Karen looking at Patrick, saw her brother as a blur. Karen soon realized that her brother was moving very fast, so fast that no one could see him move, other then her.

“I have to move that fast as well.” Karen thought Concentrating on her speed.

Karen after concentrating for a few seconds soon realized that her surrounding had slowed down. She had done it, she was moving as fast as her brother. Karen looked towards the direction of her brother with a smile on her face, but realized that he was gone.

Patrick had started to attack the armed masked men, not realizing that his sister had activated her super speed as well. Patrick didn’t want to stay in one place for to long. Patrick in truth didn’t know how fast he was moving, and therefore wanted to eliminate any chance of someone seeing him. Patrick zigzagged towards the armed masked men. When he got to the first masked man, Patrick gently pushes the man with one hand. Patrick remembered how miss Julie had said to both him and Karen, how humans do not have super strength, Patrick knew he had to hold back, the only problem was that he didn’t know how much he had to hold back. The man that Patrick pushed goes flying through the wall, with three broken ribs (unknown to Patrick). Patrick not resting, or slowing down run towards the second arm men, who started firing his weapon in surprise. Patrick sees small metal objects come out of the weapon and head towards the crowd, Patrick didn’t know what this material was but he knew that it was destructive (they were bullets). Patrick soon notices were one of the bullets were headed. “Christopher!” Patrick yells running after the bullet, trying to reach Christopher, or at least get in the way of the bullet.

Patrick running after the bullet sees something in the corner of his right eye. Patrick Turning his head sees his sister Karen jump in front of the bullet shielding Christopher from harm. Patrick didn’t know why he was surprised, it was his idea to tell his sister to protect everyone, but he said that to keep his sister away from harm. Patrick knew that this metal moving at this speed was deadly to anyone, Patrick thought back to when he saw the pastor get hit by this metal, how the pastor died from the impact, Patrick would never be able to live himself if his sister died because of his stupidity. Patrick pushed himself forward, literally willing himself to go faster.

“Karen move out of the way!” Patrick yelled at his sister, but no she stood firm, determined to protect Christopher, even if it costed her, her life.

Karen with her eyes closed, no longer concentrated on her speed therefore reverted back to normal time. Everyone was shocked to see Karen standing in front of Christopher, not sure as to how she got their when she was a few feet away from Christopher before, but their shock soon turned to fear as the armed masked man continued to fire his gun. Karen feels the bullet hit her chest, but to her surprise she feels nothing but a light tap and the loud sound of compressed metal. Karen opens her eyes and looks towards her dress to see a small bullet hole shaped mark on the dress that miss Julie had bought for her, but no blood, no injury. She was not hurt at all. Karen was invulnerable to the enemy’s attacks.

“Oh cool.” Karen said.

Christopher seeing Karen standing up grabs her arm and pulls her down to the ground.

“Are you crazy?” Christopher asks looking at Karen with angry eyes.

“Stay down!” Christopher demanded.

Patrick still using his super speed sees that Karen was unhurt from the mans bullets. Patrick was no longer worried for his little sisters safety, but that didn’t mean he could rest, his sister was invulnerable, not everyone else. Patrick moving as fast as he could prevents the other bullets from touching anybody else, and with quick hast runs towards the masked guns men. Patrick rips the gun form the masked mans hands and grabs the mans jacket with both of his hands. Patrick with great ease throws the masked Man out of a glass window, that led outside the church. Patrick wasn’t worried that he killed the man, they were on ground level after all so the man didn’t fall far at all. The man was knocked out on impact with the ground, with a broken arm and a small concussion to the head.

Patrick could breath a little easy now, but deep down he knew that his work was not finished. Patrick looks over towards his sister, who was sitting with Christopher.

“I’m going to go help miss Julie, you stay hear and protect everybody.” Patrick says still using his super speed.

Normally no human being would be able to understand Patrick’s words, with him talking so fast, Karen on the other hand could understand Patrick just fine, and lightly nods her head as she sees Patrick super speed away.

“This ends now.”
11111112.title: Patrick and Karen decide to interfere

choices: Patrick and Karen go their own way
111111121.content:
(Miss Julie 3rd person)

Miss Julie was absolutely terrified. She along with everyone else in room saw their beloved Pastor get shot in the head. Miss Julie had known Pastor Doug, or as everyone else would call him Father Doug, her whole life. As the name would suggest, father Doug was a father figure to everyone, for better or for worse as soon as you became a member of the church you became his son/daughter, you became family. Miss Julie along with everyone else knew that the last thing that a kind and holy man deserved was to be shot in the head, especially if that man was father Doug. Miss Julie on the verge of tears hugs her husband, reverting her gaze from the horrific sight that was father Doug’s lifeless corpse. She wasn’t the only one everyone in the church had tears flowing from their eyes.

“Oh no don’t revert your gaze, do not turn away from the truth!”

Miss Julie screams as she is forcibly yanked away from her beloved husband by the leader of the masked men armed with guns. The man wore no mask, his face was shown to all, the man had curly brown hair that looked like it had not been combed in weeks, and small messy beard, and over his left eye was a deep jagged scare. Miss Julie knew that this man was the leader of this horrible gang, and she also knew that the fact that this man allowed everyone to see his face probably meant that this man had no intention of letting any of them live.

“Look at him.” The man demanded as he forcibly held Miss Julie’s left arm, as they both stood before father Doug’s dead body. Miss Julie didn’t want to look, she continued to revert her gaze from the horrific sight.

“Look at him! Look at what your god has allowed!” The man yells pointing his gun at Miss Julie’s head.

“No!”

Julie turns her gaze to her husband Mark who tried to come to her rescue but was quickly restrained by two of the masked men, who both pointed their guns at his head.

“Look at him.” The man says again more quietly, but with more intensity.

Julie for a moment looks at the man who was grabbing her arm, she looks him right in his light blue eyes that were cold and devoid of any emotion. Julie soon reverts her eyes to father Doug, tears started run down her cheeks. Julie seeing her friend dead felt sadness, but also anger. Julie’s gaze returns to the man, the man who had taken her friend away

“This is your fault.” Julie says in a shaky voice, a voice not shaky because of fear, but because of her sadness and anger mixed together.

“No this is your gods fault, not mine.” The man says looking at Julie with anger in his eyes.

“No!” Julie yells

“People are dying around you, This is your fault and you know it!” Julie yells, and with a her might slaps the man in the face with her right hand.

The hall goes quite, everyone including the masked men where to shocked to even move. Julie and the man look at each other, Julie with anger, and the man with shock. The mans shock soon turns to a evil smirk.

“Behold your bravest.” The man says finally letting Julie go.

“Now behold her death.” The man says pointing his gun at Julie, ready to pull the trigger.

“BANG, BANG, BANG.”

Julie closes her eyes as The sound of gun fire echoes throughout the building. Julie soon realizes that she felt no pain, and soon opens her eyes to look at the man with his gun pointed at her. She soon realizes that the gunfire didn’t come from this man, or from any of the masked men in the room, Julie soon remembered that their where 5 masked men. Two of the men went in the direction of the children’s church. Julie soon grew worried for her children.

The man puts his gun down and pulls out a walkie-talkie from his pocket.

“Dango, come in what’s happening.” The man asks. Julie knew that he was using a code name when addressing his Ally.

Their was nothing but static on the other line.

“Come in Dango, what’s happening.”

The man grew concerned, what could have happened. Julie had a idea, of what had happened but she wasn’t sure.

“BOOM!”

Without warning something bursts in from the right hand window, something fast and strong that appeared as nothing but a blur in people’s eyes. Before anyone could get a good look at the moving object, the object jumps out of the other left hand window taking one of the masked men with him. Everyone could hears the masked man screams as he was pulled out of the building.

“What happened?! Where’d he go!” The man says terrified.

Julie wore a little smile on her face, their was only two people who could move that fast 💨.

“BOOM!”

The fast moving object appears again throwing another masked man through a window, and then disappearing without a trace.

“What’s happening?!” The man says with sweat falling from his forehead.

“Maybe, maybe this is the work of god.” Julie says with a smile as she looks at the man.

The man looks at Julie with anger in his eyes.

“Sorry dude, but it looks like it is judgment day.” Julie says

“Die bitch!” The man yells pointing his gun at Julie and pulling the trigger.

(Patrick 3rd person)

Patrick moving as fast as he could pulls two masked men outside of the beautiful church windows, but he saw using his x ray vision that the leader was starting to panic. He knew that he had to end this fast. Patrick hovers above the church, using his X-ray vision to spy on the last man.

Patrick soon sees the man fire his gun at Julie. Patrick could see the metal material speed it’s way towards Miss Julie’s head. Patrick races towards the bullet. Patrick knew that his sister was bullet proof, so he should be to. It only took a few minutes for Patrick to grab the bullet, which totally surprised Patrick, he could really move very fast. Patrick’s without waiting anymore time picks up the man and flys I
Him out of the church at super speed.

Patrick with great care knocked out all of the men and left all of them on the front lawn of the church, and secretly made his way back to the children’s church before anyone noticed that he was gone.

(Julie 3rd person)

The all of the men where gone in seconds. No one knew what had happened, no one other than Julie. Julie looks at her husband, who was looking at her in shock.

“So, have you ever thought of adoption?”
111111121.title: Good bye old friend, a tragedies end

1111111211.content:
(Patrick & Karen 3rd person)

Patrick with great hast makes his way back to the children’s church. Patrick makes sure to blend in to the crowd of children as Miss Lana comforts the kids, and makes sure that the armed masked man, Patrick sent flying through the wall was completely knocked out. Patrick seeing Karen by Christopher walks towards her with a smile on his face. Karen seeing Patrick runs towards him and gives him a massive bear huge, that would have completely crushed any normal person.

“Thank the almighty Phiysus you are ok.” Karen says with tears in her eyes.

Patrick and Karen remain silent for a few minutes as they hold each other in a warm embrace, after a few seconds Karen breaks the hug and looks at Patrick with a series expression.

“Is Miss Julie ok, And of course everyone else?” Karen quickly asks, looking at her brother.

“Calm down, sister everyone is fine, the bad guys have been taken care of.” Patrick says with a smile.

“That’s good to hear.” Karen says taking a breath of fresh air.

As Patrick and Karen talk with one another, Christopher walks over to them, looking angry 😡. Patrick soon sees Christopher walking towards both him and Karen, and he couldn’t help but get a bad feeling.

“Ok you guys have a lot of explaining to do.” Christopher says pointing his finger at Patrick.

“What do you mean?” Patrick asks, looking at Christopher a little surprised.

“You guys have been acting strange ever since I’ve met you.” Christopher says getting even more angry.

“What how?” Karen asks, getting a little mad 😠.

Patrick looks at Karen and Christopher as they both stare at each other with dagger like eyes, and quite frankly he was a little nervous. Christopher and Karen didn’t seem to get a long with one another very well. Patrick Knew his sister and the one thing she had was a temper, her stubbornness only added to that fact. Patrick knew that his sister would never hurt anyone, but when it came to anger, and these new powers they both had to be careful.

“How? You are really asking me how?” Christopher asks sarcastically, as he stares at Karen.

“Well their was the time you were grasping your ears like you where hearing something very loud, also the time when you both were staring at the wall, and I don’t know 🤔, maybe the time when you where standing up in front of gunfire.” Christopher says.

Patrick hits his head with his right palm. Apparently someone had noticed both him and Karen when they where using their powers, Christopher. They must have looked so stupid.

“Look Christopher.....”

“We don’t have to explain our selfs to you!” Karen yells cutting Patrick off.

Patrick and Christopher where taken back from Karen’s little outburst. Karen was a strong willed girl, and Patrick knew that, that strong will, was going to be a problem.

“Karen calm down.” Patrick says looking at his sister with a little worried look.

“Why should I, he’s being mean.” Karen says glaring at Christopher.

“I said calm down.” Patrick says with a cold tone that shook Karen and Christopher to her core.👺

Karen lived by three rules that she learned over time, one honer and love the gods with all of her heart, two Liston to her parents, and three never make her brother angry. If their was one thing you didn’t want to do was make her brother angry.

“Ok.” Karen says looking at her brother.

“Looks Christopher I know you have a lot of questions.” Patrick says, returning to his normal friendly voice.

“But you are going to have to be patient.” Patrick says grabbing Christopher’s shoulder.

Christopher looks into Patrick’s eyes for a few minutes.

“Yea whatever.” Christopher says walking away from Patrick and Karen.

The day passed with great hast. The police👮 Had arrive in a matter of minutes, and the 5 armed men where all arrested, without much trouble. Patrick, Karen and Christopher where reunited with Julie and Patrick and Karen got to meet Julie’s husband Mark Grayson. Everyone was currently outside of the church talking with one another. Lana had already left for home, as soon as she said good bye to Julie, and not many people where left at the church.

“So these are the kids you where talking about?” Patrick asks with a little smile.

“Yep these are the kids.” Julie says wrapping Karen and Patrick around her arms.

Patrick wondered how much miss Julie had told Mr mark about him and Karen, but by Marks behavior Patrick came to the conclusion that Julie didn’t tell Mark about Karen and his origins.

“It’s nice to meet you Mr. Mark.” Patrick says with a smile.

“It’s nice to meet you to Patrick.” Mark says holding out his hand.

Patrick stares at Patrick’s hand for a little while, Patrick never ever heard of a handshake 🤝 so he was quite confused. Mark confused takes Patrick’s hand and shakes it. Patrick soon relived that this was a form of greeting between earthlings, and was amazed.

“It’s nice to meet you to Karen.” Mark soon reaches his hand towards Karen expecting another hand shake.

Karen, having come to the same conclusion as he brother grabs marks hand and shakes it.

“Thank you for taking us in.” Karen says with a smile.

“Taking them in?” Christopher asks feeling a little confused.

Mark and Julie look at each other, and they soon shift their gaze to their son.

“Christopher buddy, me and your mom are thinking about adopting both Patrick and Karen.” Mark says getting down on his knees to look at his son Julie right behind him.

Christopher could believe this it was like his whole world was falling apart. He didn’t like Patrick, and he absolutely hated Karen, now, now he might have to spend the rest of his life with them, oh hell no.

“This isn’t fair!” Christopher yells running to Marks white Toyota truck.

Patrick, Karen, Mark, Julie watch as Christopher runs to the truck. Karen couldn’t help but feel bad for Christopher, maybe this was a bad idea.

Julie tells Patrick and Karen to wait by her car while Julie talks to Mark. Patrick could tell that Julie was going to tell Mark their secret, and he thought it was the right thing to do. The conversation lasted for a few minutes, and Patrick and Karen hears Julie call them over.

Patrick and Karen looking at Mark sees that he is a little bit hesitant. Julie had really did it, she. Had really told Mark the big secret, but both Patrick and Karen could tell that Mark didn’t really believe it.

“Hey Patrick, Karen could you guys Show Mark one of your many gifts.” Julie says.

Patrick and Karen look at Julie for a few seconds and soon look at each other.

“Karen follow my lead.” Patrick says.

Karen nods her head.

Patrick could tell that their was still a lot of people around so they could put do anything to flashy.

Patrick closes his eyes, and Karen realizing what her brother was doing closes her eyes as well. Patrick and Karen open their eyes, and Mark could barley stand up after witnessing what he saw. Both Patrick and Karen’s eyes where glowing red from their heat vision.

“Oh man it looks like I have Alien children.”
1111111211.title: My Alien Children

choices: A rather unusual group of fish
1113.content:
"Where are we going Miss Julie?" asked Karen.
"I thought I'd take you kids to the beach," replied Julie. "You could probably do with some fun after the long journey you've had."
"What's a beach?" asked Patrick.
"It's a place next to the sea where people go to swim and play," she explained. "You'll love it." They arrived at the beach, and taking one look at the sea, the kids ran off to it. They ran straight into the water, until they were completely submerged. They started swimming around underwater, and then realised something.
"We can breathe underwater!?" said a surprised Julie, and then realised something else. "And we can talk!?"
"Awesome!" exclaimed Patrick. "Let's explore!"

The two of them began swimming around down at the bottom of the ocean, seeing what they could find. Eventually they come across an underwater cave. They decide to go inside, but what do they find?
1113.title: Julie takes the super kids to the beach

11133.content:
"No way."

It was a Poxer, as they called it in Xavalia. In Earth terms in was a high-tech computer module that allows advanced communications back to planet Xavalia. But what was it doing in the bottom of the sea?

Seconds after they found the Poxer, a scanner popped up and started analyzing the two kids. A computerized voice said in Xavalian, "Scan complete. Hello, Patrick and Karen. President Taylor would like to speak with you."

A color hologram appeared of the leader of Xavalia. The kids figured her expression was on the line between urgency and fear.

"Patrick. Karen. You need to get out NOW. We have detected hostile military units in your area. If they find out who you are and where you came from... you won't stand a chance. They'll destroy you and plan to head to our world as well."

Instantly Patrick responded, "Where? What are they? Do they know we're under the sea?"

President Taylor looked puzzled. "What's a sea?"

"Never mind."

"The military units seem to be composed of iron," Taylor explained. "They have long snouts that fire explosive projectiles that could obliterate your home. We don't know what exactly they are, but if they see you, they'll probably kill them. Head back to the ship NOW."

Another computerized voice said, "Database scan complete. Military units identified by Earthlings as 'tanks'. Further information being collected."

"Thank you," said Taylor. "Avoid the tanks and get back to the ship. I'll have more intel later. Taylor out."

The Poxer closed. Patrick and Karen didn't want to leave Earth; they were already having a blast. However, staying will most likely endanger them...
11133.title: Something Else

choices: The kids go looking for people
12.content: Unknowingly to the kids, they were in Flagstaff, Arizona. There was mostly desert.
12.title: They're in Arizona

info.brief_description: Two preteens from planet Xavalia come to Earth and discover they have super powers here!
info.description:
Planet Xavalia is invaded by pirates and one lucky couple has decided to allow their children to escape at the last minute by letting them flee in a space ship, which had been built and stored in a secret building on the planet.

The children were placed in suspended animation so they wouldn't age or die as the space ship was launched from the planet as the parents were captured and later killed by the invaders.

The small spaceship was sent to Earth with the hope that the children would be able to live a normal life there, far away from the dangerous pirates who had conquered their people and their planet.

Unknown to everyone, these children would arrive on earth and wake up shortly after landing there. They would soon discover that Earth's yellow sun would cause the Xavalian children to possess superhuman strength, speed, and other incredible powers as well.

These children are soon discovered by a loving couple and raised by them. They use their powers for good. They may decide to become super heroes, or not.

The two children are a boy and a girl: Patrick, who is 8 years old, and Karen, who is 6 years old. After they land and emerge from the ship, they discover that they have super strength, they're invulnerable, they have super speed, and they can fly. They also have all the super senses, like super hearing, x-ray vision, heat vision, and super breath.

The kids are completely omnipotent on earth and have no weaknesses at all. Luckily, they aren't evil. On the contrary, they're shy, timid and curious and very helpful. They are willing to help anyone they meet, and who is willing to help them for they are homeless and have no place to stay.

Please: No killing, no sex, and no foil language permitted. I will award GP's for good additions, and I will delete short, one-liners, and poor chapters.

NOTE: Before knocking my story down with a horrible rating, please allow me to expand it with a few chapters, okay? GIVE IT A CHANCE! Therefore, I am NOT allowing any ratings at this time. Some IDIOT rated it one star on the FIRST DAY that I created this, which is very discouraging!!!! Any bad reviews will be reported to the writing.com staff as well so don't even bother.

Sorry about my last rant but I'm kinda pissed about the bad reception this story received on the first day.

Anyway, please ADD to the story if you feel like you want to contribute. 1,000 GP's awarded for good chapters! One-liners will be deleted.

Thanks and have fun!
